overview:
Scan, Organize, Store and Analyze - bills, receipts, payslips, rental income, bank statements, credit card statements, etcâ€¦

Docrage.com is a free web site where you can scan, organize, store and analyze all your bills, receipts, payslips, rental income, bank statements, credit card statements, etcâ€¦ Digitally storing are extremely useful, where you can get rid of all your paper trails. You can upload all your yearly, monthly, weekly and daily items in the digital format.

We launched Docrage.com because we believe that all bills, receipts, payslips, rental income, bank statements, credit card statements, etcâ€¦ are important, but they shouldn’t have to be a pain to keep the paper trails. Right now, our goal is to make it as easy as possible to digitize, organize and analyze your bills, receipts, payslips, rental income, bank statements, credit card statements, etcâ€¦. As the world goes digital, Docrage.com will work to get rid of unnecessary paper trails that cause you stress and harm our environment. Our Motto â€˜Go Green and Cleanâ€™.

On Docrage, you will find many free tools for organizing your bills, receipts, payslips, rental income, bank statements, credit card statements, etcâ€¦ online: â€¢ Easy aggregation of all your scanned and email items â€¢ Automatically generated statistics about your spending â€¢ Comparision of last 12 months income(bills, Receipts,etc) or expenses (payslips, other income, etc) as Graph Chart â€¢ Comparision of Expenses versus Income for a particular month as a Pie Chart. â€¢ Viewing of the documents uploaded. For eg, if a user has uploaded an Gas and Electric bill, he can view it by clicking on the link provided. â€¢ No need to keep the Paper trails. â€¢ People can store past, present and future bills, receipt, statements for as long as they need.
